author: Jerome Maurey-Delaunay
name: visualscripting.extensions.xrit
displayName: Visual Scripting Extensions for XR Interaction Toolkit
description:
Experimental visual scripting extensions for working with the XR Interaction Toolkit, as part of Road to the Metaverse - Creator Series. 

**  Warning  **
Unity does not support experimental packages and does not guarantee that experimental packages will be fully released and verified to be safe to use in production.
